name: Dimension Rift
description:
This is a prototype game to share the experience of platforming with dimensional magic!

This version of the game does not share the same focus as the main WIP version, and it was made for a game design course. This game is entirely focused on platforming, and does not include anything like combat or other important features that I plan to have in the real game.

Of course pretty much everything currently in the game is a placeholder, but I hope you find this interesting at least.

Controls:

M - Mutes Game

A D - Move Left/Right

Left Mouse Button - Dimension Sight

Right Mouse Button - Dimension Rift

1 2 3 or Scroll Wheel - Changes Target Dimension

Q - Removes All Rifts

E - Advances Dialogue

Escape - Closes Game

R - Restarts Game

Delete - Debug/Cheat - Teleports the player

Windows only for now.
